Author: LowCalPal
Text: Okay take this with a grain of salt because I am a lesbian from way back but I think men are often prone to frustration when they cannot fix the problems their loved ones have.   You could try to talk to him about your feelings on this matter, but start out with the explanation: “I don’t need you to do anything or try to fix this for me and I’m not asking for advice; I just need to talk about my feelings so that I can sort through them myself.  All I want from you here is for you to hold me and tell me that it sounds like I’m dealing with some difficult feelings”.  And then tell him your feelings after that.

Author: lil_ginge
Text: Girl, hang in there. Your body is *creating life*, like some unbelievable magic BS. Even when you don’t feel confident in what your body *looks* like, you deserve to feel confidence in what it’s doing right now!
